title: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: When modifying the font size of a label in the UI, the label's height does not update immediately.
OB: After modifying the font size of a label, the label's height remains unchanged in the UI.
EB: I expect that when I modify the font size of a label, the label's height should adjust accordingly to accommodate the new font size without any delay.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a label to the UI.
2. Edit the label's font size to '18 points'.
3. Observe that the label's height does not change to match the new font size.
